Quick search

Add blog postÂ¶

  1. Type your post in md
  2. Add specific information at the top of the document as a header:
+++
title = "Linked post"
date = "2015-10-02T21:49:20+02:00"
tags = ["golang", "programming", "theme", "hugo"]
categories = ["programming"]
banner = "img/banners/blog.jpg"
author = "John Doe"
+++
  1. Save the file in content/blog/codeLang/. This codeLang is a folder label for user organization but not needed for hugo.
  2. Rename your file as filename.codeLang.md
